title: I want report Roit Game Player Support "Jenny711"
body: i want report him  because i meet a unfair treatment.  Jenny711 said:"If there are no other questions or concerns, I'll have to consider this matter resolved. If you'd like to discuss anything else let me know, otherwise the ticket will be closed."  but i think this thing is not closed!!!!! he didn't say anything to me. and banned my acct. you guys didnt ban a real booster and ban a normal person. thats suck. he didn't solve things.

replies.body: If you can provide screenshots of your interaction with support it will help us approach this appropriately. We don't have much to go on otherwise so screenshots would be greatly appreciated in this matter.

"As I have mentioned on my previous email, "Congseng Xiaohei" is my minor account that i haven't been playin for a while since I have to get my main one up to master this season. Me and my friend would like to bring this account up back to a certain elo maybe plat or diamond from a placement "gold 5" and that's MMR boosting? As your opinion, whenever we play league, we have to play as the level where the account is at? So I have to play like a gold player when I'm a master right now?  You can't just suspend my account by just throwing out "extensive investigation", and abandon all my further action on this account right? I practice so hard to achieve master this season, and what you have said it's just insulting my skill and me myself. 

So I hope that Riot would undo all the things that he have done to this account and return my account as soon as possible.  "  that was what i said.
Are you sharing accounts? cuz that's what it sounds like.
